titleStmt.title: The merchant reall. Preached by VVilliam Loe Doctour of Diuinitie chaplaine to the kings sacred maiestie, and pastour of the Englishe church of merchants adventurers residing at Hamboroughe in Saxonie
titleStmt.author: Loe, William, d. 1645.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The merchant reall.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
